data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Shonan push upfield and Hiroshi Ibusuki gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Yokohama FC defence.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Yokohama FC close to the penalty box.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shonan's Takuya Okamoto misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Shonan.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in the half of Shonan.
Kazunari Ichimi (Yokohama FC) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
Shonan drives forward and Mitsuki Saito gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama FC in Kanagawa.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 18, Shonan have a dangerous throw-in.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Yokohama FC.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama FC's half?
In the minute 29, Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama FC's half?
Yokohama FC's Kosuke Saito is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 31, Free kick Yokohama FC.
Ryuji Sugimoto (Yokohama FC) gets in a header – but the strike hits the post! Ohhhh so close.
Shonan needs to be cautious. Yokohama FC have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 35, Yokohama FC needs to be cautious. Shonan have an attacking throw-in.
Shonan takes a corner from the right.
Shonan have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Throw-in Yokohama FC.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 44, Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akimi Barada (Shonan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in Shonan.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Yokohama FC pushes forward through Katsuhiro Nakayama, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
In the minute 48, Masahiko Inoha (Yokohama FC) has received a first yellow card.
Kosuke Saito of Yokohama FC gets in a strike, but is off target.
Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Yokohama FC takes a corner from the left.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama FC's half?
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama FC's half?
In the minute 59, Hiroshi Ibusuki (Shonan) gets in a header – but the strike hits the post! Ohhhh so close.
Shonan takes a corner from the left.
Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Kanagawa.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Koki Saito is replacing Kosuke Saito for the away team.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Yokohama FC.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 66, In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Shonan.
Shonan make their first substitution with Temma Matsuda replacing Akimi Barada.
In the minute 71, Yokohama FC are coming forward and Tatsuki Seko gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 76, Yokohama FC drive upfield and Kazunari Ichimi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shonan defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 77, Free kick Yokohama FC.
Naoki Yamada is on a sub for Mitsuki Saito for Shonan.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, The away team replace Ryuji Sugimoto with Yuki Kusano.
Yokohama FC make their third substitution with Yuji Senuma replacing Kazunari Ichimi.
Hiroshi Ibusuki puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 79, Takuya Okamoto instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Yokohama FC to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 82, Shonan have a goal kick.
Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 86, Yusuke Minagawa is on a sub for Katsuhiro Nakayama for Yokohama FC.
Masakazu Tashiro is replacing Reo Yasunaga for the away team.
In the minute 87, The home team replace Tarik Elyounoussi with Hiroto Nakagawa.
The home team replace Satoshi Tanaka with Shota Kobayashi.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 89, Yuji Senuma hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Yokohama FC!
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Kohei Tezuka (Yokohama FC) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama FC's half?
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
